p: A study conducted in Japan to evaluate the limit of detection obtained values ranging from 10 − 2 to 10 − 4 in Multiplex-PCR for the following viruses: Aichi virus, Human Parechovirus, Enterovirus, and Human Bocavirus [ 36]. These results demonstrated that the maximum detection limit that can be achieved is 10 − 4 dilution. Our study demonstrated a sensitivity of 10 − 5 for the designed primer pairs.
